title: Prasad V. Potluri Siddhartha Institute of Technology: Admission 2024, Cutoff, Courses, Fees, Reviews, Placement
meta_description: Prasad V. Potluri Siddhartha Institute of Technology Admission 2024 is open for various courses. Prasad V. Potluri Siddhartha Institute of Technology Admission is based on national level entrance exam and merit basis. Check latest updates and news on Prasad V. Potluri Siddhartha Institute of Technology Admission 2024, Cutoff, Courses, Fees, Reviews, Rankings, Placement and other details.

basic_info.name: PVPSIT Courses and Fees
description: PVPSIT 4-year B. Tech fees are INR 2.80 Lacs and the fees for the 2-year M. Tech and MBA courses are INR 1.40 Lacs and INR 97,600, respectively. The fees are affordable for most students, considering that the Institute provides placements in some of the top-ranking companies with good packages (between INR 3-6 Lacs annually)

basic_info.name: PVPSIT Cutoff 2024
description: PVPSIT AP EAPCET Cutoff 2024 is out. The table given below shows the cutoff for Round 1.

basic_info.name: PVPSIT Admission
description: For B. Tech and B. Tech Lateral Entry Programmes, the candidates must sit for EAMCET and ECET exams, respectively, that are conducted online by the Government of Andhra Pradesh. The marks obtained in these exams are considered for admission to the respective streams under B. Tech and B. Tech Lateral Entry Programmes.

For M. Tech Programmes, the marks obtained in PGECET exams are considered for admission of candidates to PVPSIT. This exam is conducted online by the Government of Andhra Pradesh. The GATE Score is also considered for admission to different M. Tech courses at PVPSIT.

For MBA Programmes, the candidates must sit for ICET exam after Graduation for admission to PVPSIT. The exam is conducted online by the Government of Andhra Pradesh. The candidates are selected on the basis of their performance in this exam.

basic_info.name: PVPSIT Placements
description: PVPSIT has released the placements 2023 report. In the PVPSIT placements 2023, a total of 956 offers were made. The Average pay package for the batch 2023 stood at INR 32 LPA with the highest pay package of INR 44 LPA and the lowest pay package of INR 20 LPA. Almost 50% of the students who received placements were given multiple offers. The top five recruiters for this batch were companies like Amazon, Walmart, Global Tech India, TCS, Capgemini, Cognizant, Wipro and Accenture and many more.
The branch-wise offers at PVPSIT are as follows:

basic_info.name: PVPSIT Campus Life and Events
description: PVPSIT is one of the top private institutes in Andhra Pradesh. It has facilities such as smart classrooms and good computer and research labs.

basic_info.name: PVPSIT Rankings
description: PVPSIT is one of the top-ranking private institutions in India that provides different Engineering and Management courses in UG and PG Programmes.

basic_info.name: PVPSIT Departments
description: PVPSIT offers different courses under UG and PG Programmes under various departments. The ratings for the same has been provided in the table below:

faqs.question: Ques. Are there any online courses available at PVPSIT College?
faqs.answer: Ans.No, there are no online courses that are currently offered by PVPSIT College. PVPSIT College provides several on-campus courses under UG and PG Programmes. The admission to these courses is based on the performance of the candidates in different entrance exams conducted by the State Government.

faqs.question: When will the admission procedure 2024 for PVPSIT College begin?
faqs.answer: Ans.The admission procedure for different courses under UG and PG Programmes at PVPSIT College will commence only after the results for the entrance exams for admission to these courses have been declared. The entire process is conducted through online mode and the notice for the same will be provided on the official college website.CheckPVPSIT Admission 2024

faqs.question: What are some of the roles offered by the companies providing placements at PVPSIT College?
faqs.answer: Ans.The top-ranking companies that provide placements at PVPSIT College offers job roles such as software development engineer and specialist programmer to the applying candidates.

faqs.question: Does PVPSIT College provide B. Tech Lateral Entry Programmes?
faqs.answer: Ans.Yes, PVPSIT College provides B. Tech Lateral Entry Programmes for 3 years. Only the candidates that have a Diploma in Engineering or any other relevant discipline are eligible to apply for this course. The admission to this course is done on the basis of the performance of the candidates in the ECET entrance exam conducted by the Government of Andhra Pradesh.

faqs.question: Will the CAT percentile be accepted for admission to PVPSIT College?
faqs.answer: Ans.No, CAT percentile is not accepted for admission to PVPSIT College. For admission to the MBA course at PVPSIT College, the candidates must appear in the ICET entrance exam that is conducted by the Government of Andhra Pradesh. On the basis of their performance in this exam, the candidates are selected for the MBA course. CheckCAT 2023

faqs.question: Are loan facilities provided to the students by PVPSIT College?
faqs.answer: Ans.Yes, loan facilities are provided to all the students at PVPSIT College. In fact, these loans are given at lower interest rates when compared to Government-recognized banks. Such loans prove to be helpful for students who are financially weak or find it difficult to pay the entire fees at a single go.

faqs.question: Will an MBA course from PVPSIT College be worth it?
faqs.answer: Ans.Yes, PVPSIT College provides one of the best MBA courses in India. With a fee of INR 97,600 for 2 years, the course was ranked 262 out of 281 by India Today in Management. The candidates also receive good placement offers by top companies such as JP Morgan, Reliance, Asian Paints, TCS and Berger Paints that provide an average package of INR 8.4 LPA to the students.

faqs.question: Which college has a better B. Tech Course: PVPSIT or ALIET?
faqs.answer: Ans.Although the course fee charged by ALIET College is lower when compared to the course fee of PVPSIT, it is better than ALIET in all respects. PVPSIT provides better facilities, better placement opportunities and more facilities when compared to ALIET. The former ranks among the 10 best colleges in Andhra Pradesh and has an overall CD Rating of 8.18. The latter comes under the 20 best colleges in Andhra Pradesh and has an overall CD Rating of 7.6.CheckALIET

faqs.question: Does PVPSIT provide B. Tech in Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning?
faqs.answer: Ans.Yes, PVPSIT College offers B. Tech in Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning. It is a relatively new stream that was commenced in 2022 with an intake of only 60 students. In a world with changing technology, the graduates of this stream have a high demand in some of the top companies including Google, Amazon, Netflix, Apple and Facebook.

faqs.question: How many streams are available in the M. Tech Course of PVPSIT College?
faqs.answer: Ans.PVPSIT College provides M. Tech courses for only two streams – Machine Design and Microwave and Communication Engineering, each with an intake of only 6 students. The students can get admissions to these streams on the basis of the marks obtained in the PGECET conducted by the Government of Andhra Pradesh.

faqs.question: Ques.Is there any loan facility available by the PVPSIT for the students?
faqs.answer: Ans.Yes, PVPSIT provides decent loan facilities for all the required students at lower interest rates from a government-recognized bank. This loan facility is helpful for students who are financially weak and unable to pay the fees in a single go.

faqs.question: Ques. How many streams are available in the MBA course of PVPSIT College?
faqs.answer: Ans.There is only one General stream course available in the MBA course of PVPSIT College. This course is ranked 257 out of 268 by Indiatoday in Management. Candidates who are willing to get admission in the MBA course need to qualify CAT or AP ICET exam and based on their performance admission is provided.

faqs.question: Ques. What are the major streams available in PVPSIT College?
faqs.answer: Ans.There are majorly two streams available in PVPSIT College. The two streams are Engineering and Management but there are different specializations under both streams for the students. Under Engineering stream, B.Tech, M.Tech, and B.Tech Lateral course and under Management stream MBA are provided.

faqs.question: Ques. Is there any online course available at PVPSIT College?
faqs.answer: Ans.No, there are no online courses available at PVPSIT College. All the courses conducted at Undergraduate and Post-graduate levels are on-campus only and most of the courses are entrance based where candidates need to qualify for the entrance exam conducted by the Institution.

faqs.question: Ques. What is the mode of entrance exam conducted by PVPSIT College for MBA and B.Tech courses?
faqs.answer: Ans.The entrance exam is conducted in online mode by PVPSIT College for MBA and B.Tech courses. These entrances like AP EAMCET, AP PGECET, AP ICET, and so on are all National level entrance exams. Based on the result of these entrances, admission is provided to the candidates and the information regarding the result is declared on the official website after the exam.

faqs.question: Ques. What is the maximum seat capacity for the B.Tech course in PVPSIT College?
faqs.answer: Ans.The maximum seat capacity for the B.Tech course in PVPSIT College is 120 (for each specialization and only 60 seats for the Civil Engineering stream). Therefore there are limited seats and these seats are provided only to those who will qualify for the entrance exam conducted by the PVPSIT College.

faqs.question: Ques. Does the PVPSIT College provide Lateral Entry for the B.Tech course?
faqs.answer: Ans.Yes, the PVPSIT College provides Lateral Entry for the B.Tech course through an entrance exam of AP ECET. This entrance exam is conducted at National Level through online mode. It is a 3-year course and candidates after completing this course, can further apply for the M.Tech or MBA course at the postgraduate level.

faqs.question: Ques. When the application procedure starts at PVPSIT College?
faqs.answer: Ans.The application process starts in September 2024 for all the courses of PVPSIT colleges. Interested candidates can fill out the form through online mode from the official college website. After the application process, candidates need to wait for the release of admit card for the entrance exam conducted by the college for admission.

Section.name: About PVPSIT
Section.description:
Prasad V. Potluri Siddhartha Institute of Technology (PVPSIT), established in 1998 and affiliated to the Jawaharlal Nehru Technological University, Kakinada, is one of the top-ranking private Engineering Institutes of India. The College has been accredited with ‘A+’ Grade (CGPA – 3.38 on a 7-point scale) by NAAC in 2017 and is approved by AICTE. The Institute was given autonomous status by UGC in 2012. PVPSIT College offers different Engineering and Management courses under UG and PG Programmes. In fact, all the UG courses offered by the Institution have been accredited by NBA in 2022 for the next 3 years. Check PVPSIT Admission 2024
PVPSIT has released the placements 2023 report. In the PVPSIT placements 2023, a total of 956 offers were made. The Average pay package for the batch 2023 stood at INR 32 LPA with the highest pay package of INR 44 LPA and the lowest pay package of INR 20 LPA. Almost 50% of the students who received placements were given multiple offers. The top five recruiters for this batch were companies like Amazon, Walmart, Global Tech India, TCS, Capgemini, Cognizant, Wipro and Accenture and many more.
